RelatedSentence: A man accused of raping a Bridgend schoolgirl while his ' black magic ' wife held her down told a jury he would not have needed any help to assault a child .
Former fit fireman and RAF mechanic Albert Hickman said the allegation , dating back 40 years , when there were allegedly books on witchcraft as well as pornography at his home , was not true .

Hickman , now 64 , admitted being jailed for 10 years in the 1980 s for the rape of a 13 - year - old girl in Shropshire but said while he was stationed at RAF St Athan and attending Salvation Army meetings with his wife several years before he did no such thing .
